mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERSHIP_ID, MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(MEMBERSHIP_INDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as MEMBERSHIP_INDATE, TO_CHAR(MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE, MEMBERSHIP_PRICE FROM HR.MEMBERSHIP_TB WHERE MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID = #{MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID} AND membership_id = (SELECT max(membership_id) FROM MEMBERSHIP_TB WHERE membership_user_id = #{MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID})

SELECT max(TO_CHAR(MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')) AS MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE FROM membership_tb WHERE MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID = #{MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID} AND membership_id NOT IN ( SELECT max(membership_id) FROM MEMBERSHIP_TB)

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_GOOGLEID, USER_GOOGLEIMG, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ZIP, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, USER_BDAY, USER_INDATE, USER_MANAGER, USER_PENDING FROM USER_TB WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id}
